atlantic.title: Could Sony and Marvel's Deal Mean a Non-White Spider-Man?
atlantic.topComment: Who cares? The intersection between identity politics and comic book franchise reboots seems to be of great importance to a specific flavor of underemployed, dorky millennial. But why? Why???

atlantic.title: Yes, Obama Was Lying About Opposing Same-Sex Marriage
atlantic.topComment: Lincoln campaigned on the promise that that he wouldn't impose new restrictions on slavery in the slaveholding states. Who holds that against him now? I don't understand this notion (well represented in the comments here) that moral integrity and hon...
